installCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y software-properties-common curl unzip && add-apt-repository ppa:ondrej/php -y && apt-get update && apt-get install -y php8.4 php8.4-cli php8.4-mbstring php8.4-xml php8.4-zip php8.4-curl && curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php -- --install-dir=/usr/local/bin --filename=composer && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm ci
